rooms.Name: Standing just outside the portal.
rooms.Description:
You are standing before a glowing portal and there is light all around you.
To the north the light gets brighter and brighter. Although the light
seems very intense your eyes are not being hurt at all.  All around you 
there are voices urging you ahead.

rooms.Name: A portal of some kind.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a spacious room that is filled with smoke and fog.  You 
can barely see your hand in front of your face much less the exits out 
of this room.  There are images that seem to pass in front of your eyes
just barely out of reach and just barely visible to you.  You seem 
to be able to pick out images of your holidays from the past. Hmmmm
kinda wierd.   There is a slight bit of music that is filtering in from 
some where but you cannot seem to make out what it is or where it is 
coming from.  There is a Large sign just before you.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The sign says:

WELCOME TO HOLIDAY HELL......
HASN'T YOUR FAMILY PUT YOU THROUGH THIS ALREADY?!??!

This zone is brought to you By the Teddy Construction company. 
With help from independant contractors Lapo and Sheol.

The sign says:

              WELCOME TO HOLIDAY HELL.....
                   HASN'T YOUR FAMILY PUT YOU THROUGH THIS ALREADY???

rooms.Name: A wintery wonderland.... You think.
rooms.Description:
There is snow all around you that glistens like flakes of pure gold.  Just 
before you there is a large castle that seems to hover and vibrate ever
so slightly. The snow shows no sign of anyone traveling this way in 
quite some time.  As you look at the castle you notice no signs of life 
there either....hmmm you wonder if anyone lives there at all.  The castle
is covered in the same glistening snow that covers the trees and the 
ground.  The sphires jut gracefully into the sky as if announcing that
tehy too are royalty as well as the inhabitants of this grandios castle.

Exits.Description: There is a drawbridge that is leading to a castle built of gold.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The castle is huge and it apprears to hover before you. The caslte
is so lovely and sparkly that you nearly have to shield your eyes
from the light that it puts out.

rooms.Name: The Drawbridge.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in from of the castle.  There is a large wooden drawbridge
in front of you.  The planks Of the drawbridge look like they have been 
joined by golden spikes.  The rope looks like it is pure gold spun
into a large rope that would hold up anything. AS you look around you see
that nearly everything looks like it has been touched with gold.
The tree's have golden leaves on them and the Bricks of the castle 
look like pure gold bricks.  There ius snow drifted up all around the 
castle walls and the moat is filled with molten gold that seems to flow 
all around you and fill you with the warm feeling.

rooms.Name: Entrance foyer to the Castle.
rooms.Description:
You are in a long room.  There are tapestries on the walls that are laced
with gold thread and look to be worth a fortune.  There are large portraits
on either side of this room and on each end as well.  The portaits look 
to be off the people who inhabit this wonderfulm castle.  There is a small
table that is long and slender and sits against on wall.  On this 
table there are candlesticks and platters in gold with lovely designs 
engraved into them. Should you go further into the castle without the 
permission of those who live here?

ExtraDescs.Description:
You are now afk to do as you please.  Get a coke, smoke a cigerette, or 
just to go potty please hurry back as all lifeless adventures are sent
back to their creator after a set time.
0

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a long dark hallway in an old musty castle. There are 
torches lighting the way as you creep down the hallway.  There seems to be 
some light coming from somewhere up ahead.  The walls are made of rock
and seem to be impentrable to the weather and enemy attacks.

rooms.Name: Father Time's Clock room.
rooms.Description:
You are in a large room that has several thousand clocks lining the walls
and ceiling.  There are big clocks, small clocks, Grandfather clocks, and
cuckoo clocks.  The clocks are a bit odd however, they do not count
hours or minutes, they count days, weeks, and the year.  The ceiling 
is high above you but yet it is covered in clocks too. The floor is
made of marble and it makes one huge clock that seems to vibrate below
you.

Exits.Description:
You see a large grandfather clock here...it seems to stand out a bit...
almost like it is standing open

rooms.Name: Baby New Year's Nursery and Playroom.
rooms.Description:
You are in a nursery.  There are little ducks all over the wallpaper.
Over the crib is a mobile that has ducks and cute little critters all
over it.  The toy box is brimming with lots of things little ones 
like to play with.  There is a changing table that has diapers and 
powder sitting on it as if the baby just had his bath.

rooms.Name: A Hallway in the damaged wing.
rooms.Description:
You are in a long hallway that appears to have been damaged by the heavy 
amounts of snow that must fall around here.  The ceiling looks to be 
damaged and swaying in the breeze.  It seems to be dangerously 
close to falling.

rooms.Name: A Room in the damaged wing.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a room in the damaged wing of the castle.  The ceiling
has caved in here and it appears to be snowing inside the building.  There
is snow covered debris everywhere.

rooms.Name: A large open field.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a spacious field. There are all sorts of wild flowers
growing in all directions.  The color here is amazing..and the scent.
It is like an assault on all of your senses.  The color, the feel of 
the flowers brushing against your legs, and the scent of the sweet
flowers wafting up to you. You could stay in this field forever 
and never see everything it has to offer.

rooms.Name: A hole in the ground.
rooms.Description:
As you descend into the ground you wonder if this is a good idea..it seems
..risky at best.  There is dirt all arounf you and you can see the roots 
of trees sticking out of the dirt. There are some tracks here but you can't
figure out what kind of animal they belong into.

rooms.Name: A groundhog's home.
rooms.Description:
This is the den of some animal.  There are tracks all around and you 
can just barely make out the leavings of his last meal.  From down
here you can see the tree roots a little better and there is dirt
all around you and above you.  There is a no light here except for 
what you brought with you.

rooms.Name: A large heart shaped arch.
rooms.Description:
You are beneath a large heart shaped red arch.  There are small hearts 
dangling from the larger one you are walking through.  As you look just 
past the arches there is a body of water just ahead.  There are 
stores and other businesses on either side of the water.

rooms.Name: The tunnel of love.
rooms.Description:
You are floating quietly down a water filled trail.  There are stores a
and other business to either side of you and you see that the heart
shaped arch you just came through now creates arches above your head.

rooms.Name: The tunnel of love.
rooms.Description:
In this tunnel there are red arches that hang aboce your head in 
the shape of hearts. The water glistens all around you and the 
stars twinkle above you with a golden glow.  As you float slowly 
down the tunnel you think back to your love and wonder what you 
are doing here without them.

rooms.Name: The tunnel of love.
rooms.Description:
There is an entrance to Valentine manor directly north of here.  There 
is the sound of the water lapping against the boat and the sound o 
 music lilting in from somewhere.  The red hearts fold out before you 
to a huge mansion that is covered from top to bottum in red hearts.
The mansion is the most beautiful thing you have ever seen.

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
The hallway continues to the north from here.  There is some light streaming
from a room just ahead of you and there is a sound of loud ticking.  The 
light from the torches on the wall dance with a breeze of unknown orgin.
The flicker of the flames leaves eerie shadows cast on the hard rock 
walls.

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an enormous hallway and there are woven tapestries on 
the walls that are several feet long and wide.  The torch light glows
off of the spoils of war that are on display.

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a hallway in the illustrious castle.  There are tapestries on the 
walls and on the tables there are golden candle holders.  Against one
wall there are a set of 8 golden plates gleaming in the torch light.

rooms.Name: A Hallway in the damaged wing.
rooms.Description:
You are standing an a wing of the castle that appears to have been damaged
by the heavy snow.  The roof looks as though it can't take another hard
winter.  It looks dangerous ...maybe you should turn back.

rooms.Name: A Room in the damaged wing.
rooms.Description: The ceiling caved in on you..check your wounds ...do you live?

rooms.Name: Land of Hearts Marriage chapel.
rooms.Description:
This is the guadiest place you have ever seen.  There are big red hearts 
appliqued to everything that would stand still for it.  The ceiling has
fake stars and moon on it.  The carpet is the most hideous shade of red 
you have ever seen and it is making you nauseous to jsut stand on it.
There is a big sign here.

ExtraDescs.Description:
NO SHIRT.....NO SHOES........NO SERVICE
NO EXCEPTIONS!!!!!!!

rooms.Name: Cupid's floral shop.
rooms.Description:
You are in the largest floral shop you have ever seen.  There are so 
many differet colored flowers around that your eyes can't seem to find 
aplace to rest upon.  The scent of the flowers is so overwhelming that 
you cannot smell anything else.  You here a happy person singing somwhere
you might need to find that person to buy some flowers.

rooms.Name: A chocolate affair confection factory.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large factory that makes chocolate.  There is a 
heavenly smell coming from the factory.  As you look around you see that
there are all kinds of chocolates sitting around in shiny papers and 
bright colorful boxes with bows on them.  You the noise from the factory 
makes you think your ears might just start bleeding.

rooms.Name: Entrance Valentine manor.
rooms.Description:
You are standing before a large mansion.  There are  large weeping willows
draping across the large rolling lawn. There are rose bushes in full bloom
lining the front porch.  Above the porch is a balcony that is as long
as the house itself and wraps around each side and continues around to 
the back of the house.  There are a set of large gates, that are always 
open, with big red hearts hanging on the black wrought iron gates.

rooms.Name: A large open field bathed in color.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large field that is covered in knee-high weeds.
The field appears to be cast in every color of the rainbow.  There are 
blues and violet streams of light all around you making you a part if 
the color streaked field.

rooms.Name: A lovely rope bridge spanning a small canyon.
rooms.Description:
There is a canyon that is far below you as you cross the quaint rope
bridge.  The rocks jut out from the walls as if tell you they will 
catch you, should you fall.  Their sharp edges are a reminder to you
that you do not want to hang around on this bridge any longer than 
necessary.

rooms.Name: In front of a small cottage
rooms.Description:
Just before you is a small modest cabin.  Although it is small it is 
tidy and looks well cared for.  The shutters on each window looks 
to be freshly painted. The windows sparkle brilliantly. On the door
into the cabin there is a shamrock painted in a bright green color.
Wonder if that is for good luck?

rooms.Name: On a Beautiful rainbow.
rooms.Description:
You are walking across a rainbow and you are amazed by the colors. There 
are beams of light everywhere and they are so warm and beautiful to look 
at. As you continue you wonder if that story about the pot of gold is 
true.

rooms.Name: On a Beautiful rainbow.
rooms.Description:
You are still walking along the rainbow and still it seems to continue
forever.  The colors seem to be glowing brightly now.  You feel as 
if the colors are coming up through your feet and filling your whole 
body with a glowing feeling.

rooms.Name: On a Beautiful rainbow.
rooms.Description:
Still the rainbow continues...... The colors are starting to annoy you 
at this point. You have been walking along this rainbow forever and 
it seems to never end.

rooms.Name: At the end of the rainbow.
rooms.Description:
FINALLY the end of the rainbow. As you sit down to rest you notice the 
mystic pot of gold lying at your feet...but it seems big enough to 
get into.  Should you really chance going into a pot?  But wait
it is rumored to be filled with gold....

rooms.Name: A pot 'o Gold
rooms.Description:
You are just inside the mouth of the pot of gold.  Gold glitters all around
you.  The sight is blinding and until you eyes adjust to the brightness y
squint and your eyes water.  There is someone singing but it seems like it
is coming from further down in the pot of gold

rooms.Name: A pot 'o Gold
rooms.Description:
You are further down in the pot of gold now. The singing seems to be coming 
from even further down in the pot of gold.  You eyes have now adjusted
to the sight of all the gold that is glittering all around you.

rooms.Name: A pot 'o Gold
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the very bottum of the pot of gold.  There is a small 
man here and he appears to be guarding the gold...daring you to take any.

rooms.Name: A large kitchen.
rooms.Description:
You are in a Large industrial looking kitchen. On the enormous stove there
are huge pots of boiling water.  In the pots of boiling water there are 
thousands of eggs being boiled.  The kitchen is painted with a loved pastel
yellow-pink-blue color scheme. There are eggs sitting everywhere cooling and
boiling ...cooling and boiling.... Who needs this many boiled eggs?

rooms.Name: The Color room.
rooms.Description:
This is a large room.  The colors in here are the same as in the kitchen. 
There are huge vats of colored water here in every color you could imagine
...and a few you couldn't ( puce easter eggs?)  Sitting around on all the 
tables there are eggs that have been colored waiting to dry and waiting 
to be distributed around the world.

rooms.Name: The candy room.
rooms.Description:
This is an enormous room that is used to make all the easter bunnies goodies
in.  There are choclates and marshmellow candies everywhere. Some are in 
colorful packages while others are waiting to be wrapped.  There are 
candies that are shaped as bunnies, chicks, eggs, lambs and other cute 
things (YUCK!).  This room is bustling with people and you can pass-by 
unnoticed as there is no way these people could hear you
even if you screamed.

rooms.Name: The egg laying room.
rooms.Description:
There are several hundred chickens here laying enough eggs so that the 
easter bunny might make children happy. The smell in here is horrible, 
the heat is stifling and your eyes are watering from the combination.
 There are chicken feathers floating through the air and you are walking
on something squishy, yet you don't WANT to know what it is.

rooms.Name: The Easter Bunny's Basket.
rooms.Description:
You are in a sacred place.....THE basket of THE easter bunny.  There are 
eggs of every shape and size all around it.  The eggs are all pretty 
much easter colors with the exception of one way doen in the bottom of 
the basket.  This egg in the bottom of the basket is red white and blue.
Seems a little odd to have a red white and blue egg for easter...

Exits.Description:
This is a huge egg....so large that you might could sit in it.  It has 
red and white stripes on it and bigh stars in it...Seems kinda strange for 
an easter egg

ExtraDescs.Description:
This is a large Red, White, and Blue egg here ...IT seems awful large 
to be an easter egg...and those colors...it seems to have a seam
in the middle as if it might split open..........

rooms.Name: Front Room in a Small Cottage
rooms.Description:
The room is modestly furnished in lovely green plaid material.  There is 
a sofa and a chair are here.  The shelves built into the walls appear to be
overflowing with well worn books.  There is a large window on one wall that
lets the sunshine in to brighten things up just a bit.  The room looks 
so cheerful that it brightens your day just to gaze upon it.

rooms.Name: Groundhogs Bedroom
rooms.Description:
There is a small about of nesting material in a corner of this room.  There
seems to be no one here at this time.  This room has been carved out of the 
dirt from the other rooms so it seems a bit more rough and the walls are not 
smooth like the ones in the other rooms.

rooms.Name: Red, White, and Blue Egg.
rooms.Description:
This egg seems to be a hallway or tunnel of sorts.  There is nothing much 
here to see or do.   There are a few blank white washed walls and that 
is it.

rooms.Name: Red, White, and Blue Flag room.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large hall that seems dedicated to The United States
Flag.  The entire room is Empty except for a roped off area in the center 
of the room that houses a Flag.  The flag is on a flag pole and seem to be
quite old.  There are not that many stars on it so apparently it is rather
old.  There is a skylight in the ceiling so that natural light might flow
in over it. This Flag seems pretty important...though you can't recall 
just why....?

Exits.Description:
You see a huge Red, White, and Blue egg here.  Wonder what it does... It
appears to open.

rooms.Name: Uncle Sam's Office
rooms.Description:
There is a enourmous oak and marble desk in the middle of this huge office.
There is a large red white and blue flag in the corner.  There is a skylight
that shines light from up above and it is centered over the desk.  The desk
looks like someone important might work there.  The name plate on the desk
says Uncle Sam...you didn't know your uncle had a cool office like this
did you?

rooms.Name: Out in a Rocky Field
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large rocky field.  There is very littl grass and where
there is a small patch of grass it is full of sand and rocks. You could 
not walk more than a few feet without having to step over some rocks.

rooms.Name: Hall of Statues.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a Large room.  The mood in this room is sober and solemn,
this rooms houses the statues of veterans that have fallen in the protection 
of our freedom.  Along the walls there are photographs taken of our men in 
the field, away from their home.  In the center of the room is a large statue
showing several men trying to raise an american flag, In each of the faces of
the statue you can see the pride each has for the country they love.

rooms.Name: Veteran's Memorial.
rooms.Description:
You stand before a memorial to the men who lost their lives in war.  There 
are a lot of people standing around, some are crying.  In this memorial 
you see the faces of fathers, husbands, brothers, and sons.  There 
are several pictures around the room with small brass name plates 
telling the names of the people who lost their lives in war and some 
who are still considered missing action.

ExtraDescs.Description:
There is an enormous memorial here to the men and women that have lost their
lives in war.  There are many people standing here crying and reliving 
some of the darkest days in their lives.

rooms.Name: In a Dark Field.
rooms.Description:
You are in a large dark field. There is only on tree that stands in this 
field and it looks as if the tree died some years ago and someone 
forgot to come and cut it down.  The only thing in this field that is 
alive is the vulture that is eyeing you suspiciously.

rooms.Name: In a Grandfather Clock.
rooms.Description:
You are standing inside an enormous clock.  You look from side to side and y
can see the gears and interworkings of the clock.  There is a large pedalum
swinging back and forth and keeping time.

rooms.Name: Hall in Valentine Manor
rooms.Description:
The room has high exposed beam ceilings.  The walls seem to go on and on and 
are covered in the latest most up to date art.  There are tapestries from 
australia and paintings from paris.  There is a sculpture in the center
of the room that looks like the old legend cupid.

rooms.Name: Library in Valentine Manor
rooms.Description:
The walls in this room are covered with books and more books.  The greatest 
number of them look like first editions and worth a great deal of money.
Off in one corner of the room is a large desk that has a light above it so 
that you can read anytime at all.  On on side of the room is a huge window
over looking the grounds of this enormous mansion.  Just below the window in
a window seat so that you can sit and read while looking at the horse stables.

rooms.Name: Kitchen in Valentine Manor
rooms.Description:
This looks like the kitchen you might see in a four star resteraunt. The 
industrial sized stove has a huge pot of some delicious smelling substance
cooking on it.  The kitchen is hot and it is humid and you can already feel 
the sweat breaking out on your forehead.

rooms.Name: Before the Throne
rooms.Description:
The throne before you is done in a beautiful crushed red velvet.  The arms 
and legs of the throne are made of oak and are polished so that they will 
shine.  There is a large portrait of the former St Valentine that hangs
above the throne.  There is a group of musicians here playing some sort
of love song that you can never remember the words to ..except for the 
first 2 words..."ONLY YOU" da da dada.

rooms.Name: Before the Throne
rooms.Description:
The throne before you is done in a beautiful crushed red velvet.  The arms 
and legs of the throne are made of oak and are polished so that they will 
shine.  There is a large portrait of the former St Valentine that hangs
above the throne.  There is a group of musicians here playing some sort
of love song that you can never remember the words to ..except for the 
first 2 words..."ONLY YOU" da da dada.

rooms.Name: St. Valentine's Throne of Hearts.
rooms.Description:
There is a large throne here that is in the shape of a large heart and it has
lovely red velvet covering every square inch.  In fact as you look around 
you can't see hardly anything that isn't red or anything that doesn't have 
some red on it or in it.

Exits.Description: There is a heart shaped trapdoor here.  Wonder where it goes?

rooms.Name: The dungeon Of Lost Loves.
rooms.Description:
The red lined walls and halls that your eyes have become attuned to have
changed to a dingy and decaying grey of moldy blood.  The stench of lost 
love hangs in the air, and the floor is littered with pieces of broken
hearts and downtrodden love letters.

Exits.Description: There is a heart shaped trap door here.  Wonder where it goes?

rooms.Name: A cell in the Dungeon.
rooms.Description:
You are in a dark, dank cell.  There is little to do here and even less to 
look at.  The small room is devoid of light and color.  There is a stench 
here that takes your breath and leaves you gasping for air.  On one side 
of the room there is a small cot that contains a soul who let his pride over
rule his love for his soulmate and thus must spend his life in an eternal
hell with no love.

rooms.Name: A cell in the dungeon.
rooms.Description:
The cell you are standing in is damp and hot.  There is a small slit of a w
window at the top of one of the walls and it barely lets enough air in the 
breath much less cool this small place.  There is a person here wandering 
around the cell like they aren't sure what to do with themselves.

rooms.Name: A cell in the dungeon.
rooms.Description:
You are in a small room that has 3 cinder block walls and one wall of iron 
bars.  There is almost no light in here as there are no windows for light
to come through.   There is a small cot to one side of the room.  On the 
cot is a thin mattress and a filthy blanket and pillow.  There is a person
sitting here on the floor sobbing.

rooms.Name: A cell in the Dungeon.
rooms.Description:
You are in a small cell that is home to the people who have thrown love 
away for pride, money, or other reasons.  The cell has cinder block walls
andthere is almost no light coming though the iron bars.  In the corner 
is a small cot containing a filthy blanket and a thin mattress.  There
is a person here laying on the thin mattress with a despondant look 
on their face.

rooms.Name: Tunnel of Desolution
rooms.Description:
This is where the lost loves and forgotten or abandoned affairs go after
they are thrown aside to sit and fester in the darkest corners of our
hearts.  The moans of un-requited love crys from the cells to the east
and the west.

Exits.Description:
There are some iron bars here.. The people here must be very dangerous..
To others or is it themselves.
There are some iron bars here.  Are the prisoners here dangerous?

rooms.Name: Tunnel of Desolution
rooms.Description:
Love lost and tost begins to bring a tear to your eye.  The misery of these
lost causes makes you want to destroy everything in your path and tear
at your eyes.  The crying of the doomed or ignored rests in this dungeon
and you wish to the gods that be for escape from this fate.

Exits.Description:
There are some iron bars here enclosing the cell.  There are crys coming 
from the other side of the bars.

there are some iron bars here.  There is a face looking out between them 
with a forlorn look on it.

rooms.Name: Before a Large Pumpkin
rooms.Description:
The massive glowing eyes and mouth of the pumpkin before you seem to flicker
as if infested with demons and shadowy ghouls of the dark.  You begin to 
think twice about entering as you hear the moans and screams that issue
forth from the orifaces of the Great Pumpkin.  It is more than your puny
force of will can muster just to keep you on your feet without fainting
at the sight.

rooms.Name: Entrance to a Haunted Pumpkin
rooms.Description:
Passing through the gaping maw of the pumpkin you almost belive all is well
as the screams are drawn to the slightest muffle and a haunting laugh echoes
through the hall as if to bid you welcome to this hall of hells.  The light
you had noticed before is emitted by a HUGE candelabra standing in the foyer
of this demonically carved pumkin.

rooms.Name: Front room in a haunted Pumpkin
rooms.Description:
This pumpkin seems infinitly larger on the inside than on the outside, and
the dripping goo and candlewax from the walls seems to put out an evil glow
that you can't quite understand.  The shadows seem to be almost alive as if
they are watching you enter this might foyer, and a hideous laughter erupts
from above as you wander farther into this domain!

rooms.Name: Further in a Haunted Pumpkin
rooms.Description:
A dank stairway has been molded out of mounds of pumpkin seeds and human
flesh.  The walls lining it are adorned with halloween masks and ghoulish
gargoyles.  The laughter seems nearer and the darkness seems to flow from
the walls themselves.

rooms.Name: 2nd Floor in the haunted pumpkin
rooms.Description:
This hallway, like every other room in this moldy pumpkin, is covered with
the smell of rotting flesh and seeds.  And the odd glow is brighter here
almost blinding you to the distance to the end of the hall.

rooms.Name: 2nd floor in the Haunted pumpkin
rooms.Description:
The smell of burnt flesh and rotten candy bars waifs from the eastern end
of this hall.  You notice trick or treat bags and half burnt masks strewn
about the floor.  The hideous laughter, or maniacal screaming, is almost
deafining.

rooms.Name: 2nd floor in the haunted pumpkin
rooms.Description:
The halls eternal darkness is almost shattered by the glowing of what seems
to be a pair of flickering red eyes.  They seem to be further east but within
this house of horrors who is to know.

rooms.Name: 2nd floor in the Haunted pumpkin
rooms.Description:
The Will-o-Wisp that lead you here has mysteriously disappeared and the eyes
and laughter float all around you before they dissapear up these stairs made
of bone and candy apple sticks.  You think to yourself what kind of madman
would be found in a house like this, and slightly remember a childhood story
of a man with a pumpkin for a head.  Dismissing this notion you trudge onward
and upward

rooms.Name: The Attic in the Haunted pumpkin
rooms.Description:
Clearing away cobwebs and dust covered sheets you have entered the attic of
this pumpkin without nary a sign of the owner.  Perhaps you were mistaken to
have ever entered these halls in search of adventure, for all it has brought
you to is darkness and thoughts of a childhood stomach-ache from too much
Halloween candy.

rooms.Name: Jack Pumpkinhead's Throne room
rooms.Description:
This room's centerpiece is a large throne made of sticks and stones welded
together with locks of childrens hair and marrow from thier bones.  Bits
of costumes and garments of long forgotten trick or treaters are strewn about
the room, as are pieces of shining razor blades and bottles of poison.  The
person who resides here is one sick individual.  A DEATHLY CHILLING wind
howls from the window set in the western wall, making you think twice about
jumping out of Jack's way.

rooms.Name: Out the Window
rooms.Description:
You should have looked before you lept.  After the ferocity of Jack, didn't
you figure he was letting you out just a bit too easy?  Or did you think
escape was in his list of things to let you little mortals do?

rooms.Name: Out to sea
rooms.Description:
You are floating out to see and all you can see is the salt water of the sea.
You must be near to something as you seem to have been floating aimlessly 
for days.  The salt air seems to do something to you and  it makes you 
jittery and anxious to get to land.

rooms.Name: Tunnel Of Love
rooms.Description:
You continue to float down the water towards the Valentine mansion.  There
is music floating in from someplace and it is some sweet, sappy, and just
plain gross love song that is playing over and over and over....

rooms.Name: Out to sea
rooms.Description:
You are floating aimlessly out at sea.  There is nothing around you except 
for lots of salt water and the occasionaly fish that might jump out of the 
water. You feel like you have been floating on the sea for forever and you 
can't wait to get your feet back on solid ground.

rooms.Name: A port at sea.
rooms.Description:
You have finally come to a port at sea.   There isn't much  here it seems 
besides a fort and some indians. This must be the famous plymoth rock, 
where the mayflower landed with the pilgrams.

rooms.Name: Before the Fort
rooms.Description:
You are standing before a large fort that has been made from trees inserted 
into the ground. The fort look sturdy and appears to have several families
living in it.  There are soldiers wandering around outside of the open fort
and there are some indians going in and out of the fort.

rooms.Name: Before a large table
rooms.Description:
Before you is a grand table that is full of wonderful foods. In the center
of the table is a HUGE turkey that looks like it was roasted and it is 
the perfect golden brown color.  There are other treats here as well.
There are pies and other desserts that are waiting on a nearby table for 
the diners to finish eating their feast.

rooms.Name: At the table
rooms.Description:
You are at the table now and you can see that the faces around this table 
are very different.  Seated at each end of the table are people who have 
been enemies for some time.  At one end is the Man who runs the fort and 
at the other end is the Indian chief.  There are men and women seated around
the table that would normally be scared of each other and be 
trying to hurt each other.

rooms.Name: By a teepee
rooms.Description:
This is a Teepee that has been made by using animal hides stretched over a
frame made of wood.  There are colorful picture painted on the outside as 
some sort of symbol.  Just in front of the teepee is a cooking fire and 
it is blazing brightly and some sort of roasting meat is in the fire.

rooms.Name: In the teepee
rooms.Description:
You are in a the teepee of the chief os this tribe of indians.  There are 
colorful pictures painted on the inner walls of this teepee.  There are
hides of animals piled to one side of the teepee to keep them warm in the
winter.  To the west is the entrance that you just came in from and will 
lead you back out to the fort.

rooms.Name: In a field
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large open filed that is growing some plants. As you 
look closer you realize it is the crop of some industrious farmer.  Here in
this field there are all kinds of vegatables growing.  You see the neat
rows of corn, carrots, and other gourd type vegtables.

rooms.Name: In the field
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a field that looks to be well cared for.  There are neat
little rows of carrots and beans going as far as the eye can see.  You see 
what looks to be the start of a pumpkin patch here.

rooms.Name: In a large pumpkin patch.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large pumpkin patch, with pumpkins reaching as far 
as the eye can see.  There are 2 odd looking children here that seem to be 
waiting for something.  It seems odd that childern would wait in a darkened
pumpkin patch for anything

rooms.Name: In the fort
rooms.Description:
You are standing just inside the gate of a large fort.  There are people 
alking around you as they go about their day to day business.  There 
are several indians here as well.  It looks like they are getting ready 
for quite a feast.

rooms.Name: Bedroom in a Small cottage
rooms.Description:
There is a Twin bed in the corner of this otherwise bare room.  There are 
a few books on a nightstand that stands next to the small bed. This room,
like all the others, is immaculate.  The bed is covered in a tidy 
bedspread that is green and white plaid. The window has a curtain of the 
same material.  There is a shamrock painted on the wall over the bed..
....How strange.

rooms.Name: In the Kitchen in the Small Cottage
rooms.Description:
The kitchen in this quaint cottage looks like it came from a magazine. 
The cupboard are of the whitest white with green trim and brass handles.
The dishes are all neatly stacked in their places and the sink shines 
with a star-like brillance.  There is a small breakfast alcove with a 
small wrought iron table and chairs.  The table cloth and seat covers
are of the same green and white plaid that is in the front room.

rooms.Name: Out Behind the Small cottage
rooms.Description:
You are in a field behind the cottage.  There is a hactchet where someone
was chopping wood for a fire.  Along one side of the cabin you see
a large pile of neatly stacked wood.  From where you stand you can 
see the mountains that surround this small cottage.  The view here is
breathtaking.

rooms.Name: Dressing room
rooms.Description:
You are in a small room where people who are getting married come to change
into their wedding attire.  There are clothes handing from hooks on the 
back side of the door.  Above you a bare light bulb shines harsh light down 
on you.

rooms.Name: Amongst the guest
rooms.Description:
You are walking amongst the guests at this quicky wedding.  There are people
all around you dressed in guady clothing and crying very theatrically.  You
better sit down if you don't want to miss any of it.

rooms.Name: Amongst the guest
rooms.Description:
Youa re walking amongst the guest at a wedding ceremony, if you could call it 
that.  Everyone is sobbing quietly and holding tissues to dab their eyes.  The
minister is just starting the ceremony...you better sit down.

rooms.Name: Aisle
rooms.Description:
You are walking down an aisle in this quicky marriage chapel.  Just before you
is the minster who will change into a couple.  Are you sure your ready to be
tied down to one person, to give up your freedom?  There are guests on 
either side of the aisle crying and lightly dabbing their eyes with tissues.

Exits.Description: There is a door here that  has a small sign on it that says Dressing room.

rooms.Name: Before the Minster
rooms.Description:
This is your last chance to listen to your cold feet.  RRRRUUUUUUUNNNNNNNN!
The minster stand here looking at you and has just asked you to take this
person for your spouse...forever...and ever......What are you gonna do?

rooms.Name: Before a Pilgrams house
rooms.Description:
Standing before a quaint little cottage, You notice the plume of smoke
rising through the chimney and realize someone must be home. You see 
the flicker of candlelight through the small panes of glass in the 
window. Through the window you see the Pilgram family sitting down 
to their supper.

rooms.Name: Before a Pilgrams house
rooms.Description:
You stand before a small cottage built from logs.  It is small but yet looks 
warm and comfy inside. There is a billowy plume of smoke coming from the 
chimney.  Through the windows you can see that the famil that lives there 
and they look perfectly happy in their homes and with their family 
surrounding them.

rooms.Name: In a Pilgrams House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a one room cottage.  This house is decorated a little 
more than the other one but this family must have a bit more money.  In 
this house there are sleeping quarters up in the attic.  There is a ladder
that leads up to the beds.  You can see the shelves which serve as a pantry
and they are stocked full for the long winter.  There is a pot on the stove
that looks to be full of some delicious smelling substance.

rooms.Name: In a Pilgrams House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a functional one room cottage.  There are sleeping cots 
stacked up along one side of the room.  In the fireplace there is a fire
going that is quite warm and cozy.  There is a long wooden table in the 
center of the room with long benches on either side.  There aren't many 
decorations around as it is to be functional and life here is hard.  The 
only decoration you see is a large quilt that is hanging over the rocking
chair in the corner.
